formalpara.title: Internal help for this function in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'TOLOWER' =-
[Syntax] TOLOWER(<string>)
[Synopsis] Convert the string to lower case.
[Description] Example: ${TOLOWER(Example)} returns "example"

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:
